channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Denim & Co
channel.desc: Discover on-trend yet timeless pieces from Denim & Co., perfect for any woman who wants to look fabulous and feel confident about the value she receives.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ultrasun Professional Suncare
channel.desc: Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Luxury Handbags with Radley
channel.desc: Treat yourself to a little luxury this season with Radley London's gorgeous bags and accessories. Discover on-trend totes, chic cross-bodies and much more in this showcase of covetable handbags.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Margaret Dabbs London
channel.desc: Pamper your hands and feet with innovative hand and footcare formulas from international podiatrist and foot expert Margaret Dabbs.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Hair by Philip Kingsley
channel.desc: Internationally renowned Philip Kingsley and his team give expert tips and tricks on how to get the best results for your hair and scalp.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Moda In Pelle
channel.desc: Discover fashionable footwear from Moda In Pelle which combines affordable luxury and complete comfort for you.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Summer Sleepwear
channel.desc: Upgrade your nightwear collection this summer with our fabulous selection. From cosy pyjamas to stylish nightdresses and robes, we've got you covered this season.
